scripts.studio:dev: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma studio
scripts.studio:test: npm run env:test -- npx prisma studio
scripts.db:dev:pull: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma db pull
scripts.db:dev:push: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma db push
scripts.db:test:pull: npm run env:test -- npx prisma db pull
scripts.db:test:push: npm run env:test -- npx prisma db push
scripts.migrate:dev:dev: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.migrate:dev:reset: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.migrate:test:dev: npm run env:test -- npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.migrate:test:reset: npm run env:test -- npx prisma migrate reset
